alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Fillmore; Houston; Mower; Olmsted; Wabasha; Winona (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 07 at 2:32PM CST until December 09 at 12:00PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: .OVERVIEW...Precipitation will break out late Thursday afternoon and spread across the area. Most areas will see snow accumulation but warmer air could change the precipitation to rain or freezing rain occasionally. Light icing is also possible that could also hamper travel conditions. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THURSDAY TO NOON CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Parts of north central and northeast Iowa, southeast Minnesota and southwest Wisconsin. * WHEN...From 6 PM Thursday to noon CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation types might change from time to time as this weather system moves through. Watch for changing road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by using 5 1 1 sites online.

area.areaDesc: Dodge; Fillmore; Houston; Mower; Olmsted; Wabasha; Winona
